result.markdown:
--- title: "Bellingham Bay" order: 1 echo: true engine: knitr --- ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} # Load packages suppressMessages({ library(dplyr) library(ggplot2) library(plotly) library(glue) library(htmltools) }) # Query GSIDB get_data <- function(sql) { con <- DBI::dbConnect( drv = RPostgres::Postgres(), dbname = Sys.getenv("POSTGRES_DATABASE"), host = Sys.getenv("POSTGRES_HOST"), port = Sys.getenv("POSTGRES_PORT"), user = Sys.getenv("POSTGRES_USER"), password = Sys.getenv("POSTGRES_PASSWORD") ) on.exit(DBI::dbDisconnect(con)) DBI::dbGetQuery(con, sql) } # A table with searching and a download button to export as csv make_table <- function(data, id, name) { t_id <- glue('{id}_{name}_table') file <- glue('{id}_{name}.csv') tagList( tags$div( style = "display: flex; justify-content: space-between;", tags$button( class = "btn btn-sm btn-primary rounded-3", "Download as CSV", onclick = glue("Reactable.downloadDataCSV('{t_id}', '{file}')") ), tags$input( class = "rt-search", type = "text", placeholder = "Search", oninput = glue("Reactable.setSearch('{t_id}', this.value)") ) ), reactable::reactable( data, searchable = FALSE, showPageSizeOptions = TRUE, elementId = t_id ) ) } ``` ::: ::: {.panel-tabset} ## Bottle-Chlorophyll ### Data By Provider ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} sql <- " select area_id, provider, analyte as parameter, extract(year from sample_date) as year, count(*) as n_measurements from app.bottle where 1=1 and area_id = 'Bellingham Bay' and analyte = 'Chlorophyll' group by extract(year from sample_date), area_id, provider, analyte order by year, provider " data <- get_data(sql) names(data) <- c(if('Bellingham Bay' != "Global") "Area", "Provider", "Parameter", "Year", "Measurement Count") if(nrow(data) == 0) { cat("No data available") } else { make_table(data, id = "Bellingham Bay_Bottle_Chlorophyll", name = "summary") } ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` No data available ``` ::: ::: ### Geographical Extent ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} sql <- " select location_id, loc_desc as description, st_x(st_transform(loc_geom, 4326)) as lon, st_y(st_transform(loc_geom, 4326)) as lat, COUNT(*) AS record_count from app.bottle where 1=1 and loc_geom is not null and area_id = 'Bellingham Bay' and analyte = 'Chlorophyll' GROUP BY location_id, loc_desc, lon, lat " data <-get_data(sql) |> mutate(tooltip = glue("Location ID: {location_id}
Location Description: {description}
Sampe Count: {record_count}")) if(nrow(data) == 0) { cat("No data available") } else { # Plotly doesn't auto center map on data points with R center_lon <- mean(data$lon) center_lat <- mean(data$lat) zoom <- ifelse('Bellingham Bay' == "Global", 6, 8) plot_ly( data = data, lon = ~lon, lat = ~lat, type = 'scattermapbox', mode = "markers", marker = list(size = 9, line = list(width = 1, color = "black")), hovertext = ~tooltip ) |> layout(mapbox = list( style = "open-street-map", center = list(lon = center_lon, lat = center_lat), zoom = zoom )) } ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` No data available ``` ::: ::: ### Timeseries ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} sql <- " select date_trunc('month', sample_date)::date as sample_date, count(*) as n_measurements from app.bottle where 1=1 and area_id = 'Bellingham Bay' and analyte = 'Chlorophyll' and sample_date IS NOT NULL group by date_trunc('month', sample_date)::date " data <- get_data(sql) if(nrow(data) == 0) { cat("No data available") } else { plot_ly(data, x = ~sample_date, y = ~n_measurements, type = "bar") |> layout( title = "Chlorophyll Measurements by Month", xaxis = list(title = "Sample Date"), yaxis = list(title = "Number of Measurements", tickformat = ",d") ) } ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` No data available ``` ::: ::: ### Depth distribution ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} sql <- " select upper_depth, depth_units from app.bottle where 1=1 and upper_depth is not null and depth_units is not null and area_id = 'Bellingham Bay' and analyte = 'Chlorophyll' " data <- get_data(sql) if(nrow(data) == 0) { cat("No data available") } else { # Define min and max depth for the x-axis x_min <- 0 # Minimum depth x_max <- 350 # Maximum depth # Create histogram plot_ly( data = data, x = ~upper_depth, type = "histogram", xbins = list( start = x_min, # Set bin start end = x_max, # Set bin end size = 5 # Bin width of 5 meters ) ) |> layout( title = "Chlorophyll Measurements by Depth", xaxis = list( title = glue("Depth ({toString(unique(data$depth_units))})"), range = c(x_min, x_max) # Ensure fixed depth range ), yaxis = list(title = "Number of Measurements", tickformat = ",d") ) } ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` No data available ``` ::: ::: ### Heatmap ::: {.panel-tabset} #### Heatmap ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} sql <- " select analyte as parameter, extract(year from sample_date) as year, extract(month from sample_date) as month, count(*) as n_measurements, percentile_cont(0.5) within group (order by result) as median, string_agg(distinct units, ', ') as units from app.bottle where 1=1 and area_id = 'Bellingham Bay' and analyte = 'Chlorophyll' group by extract(year from sample_date), extract(month from sample_date), analyte " # query db data <- get_data(sql) |> filter(!is.na(year), !is.na(month)) if(nrow(data) == 0){ cat("No data available") }else{ data <- data |> mutate( abb_month = factor(month.abb[month], levels = month.abb), median = signif(median, digits = 3), tooltip = glue::glue( "{abb_month} {year}", "Count: {format(n_measurements, big.mark = ',')}", "Median: {median} {units}", .sep = "
", .na = "--" ) ) p <- ggplot(data = data, aes(x = abb_month, y = year, fill = median)) + ggiraph::geom_tile_interactive(aes(tooltip = tooltip), color = "black", width = 1) + scale_fill_distiller( palette = "Greens", direction = 1, na.value = "gray90" ) + #coord_fixed() + # keep tile as square scale_x_discrete( breaks = month.abb, drop = FALSE, expand = c(0,0), position = "top" ) + scale_y_reverse(expand = c(0,0)) + labs(y = "Year", fill = paste0("Median Chlorophyll\n(",toString(unique(data$units)),")")) + theme_bw() + theme( axis.title.x=element_blank(), panel.grid.major = element_blank(), panel.grid.minor = element_blank(), #legend.position = "bottom" ) ggiraph::girafe(ggobj = p) } ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` No data available ``` ::: ::: #### Heatmap Data The heatmap data contains samples from all depths and locations in a given area. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} if(nrow(data) == 0) { cat("No data available") } else{ data |> select( #Area = area_id, Year = year, Month = abb_month, Parameter = parameter, Units = units, 'Measurement Count' = n_measurements, Median = median ) |> make_table(id = "Bellingham Bay_Bottle_Chlorophyll", name = "heatmap") } ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` No data available ``` ::: ::: ::: ## Bottle-ChlorophyllA ### Data By Provider ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} sql <- " select area_id, provider, analyte as parameter, extract(year from sample_date) as year, count(*) as n_measurements from app.bottle where 1=1 and area_id = 'Bellingham Bay' and analyte = 'ChlorophyllA' group by extract(year from sample_date), area_id, provider, analyte order by year, provider " data <- get_data(sql) names(data) <- c(if('Bellingham Bay' != "Global") "Area", "Provider", "Parameter", "Year", "Measurement Count") if(nrow(data) == 0) { cat("No data available") } else { make_table(data, id = "Bellingham Bay_Bottle_ChlorophyllA", name = "summary") } ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ### Geographical Extent ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} sql <- " select location_id, loc_desc as description, st_x(st_transform(loc_geom, 4326)) as lon, st_y(st_transform(loc_geom, 4326)) as lat, COUNT(*) AS record_count from app.bottle where 1=1 and loc_geom is not null and area_id = 'Bellingham Bay' and analyte = 'ChlorophyllA' GROUP BY location_id, loc_desc, lon, lat " data <-get_data(sql) |> mutate(tooltip = glue("Location ID: {location_id}
Location Description: {description}
Sampe Count: {record_count}")) if(nrow(data) == 0) { cat("No data available") } else { # Plotly doesn't auto center map on data points with R center_lon <- mean(data$lon) center_lat <- mean(data$lat) zoom <- ifelse('Bellingham Bay' == "Global", 6, 8) plot_ly( data = data, lon = ~lon, lat = ~lat, type = 'scattermapbox', mode = "markers", marker = list(size = 9, line = list(width = 1, color = "black")), hovertext = ~tooltip ) |> layout(mapbox = list( style = "open-street-map", center = list(lon = center_lon, lat = center_lat), zoom = zoom )) } ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ### Timeseries ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} sql <- " select date_trunc('month', sample_date)::date as sample_date, count(*) as n_measurements from app.bottle where 1=1 and area_id = 'Bellingham Bay' and analyte = 'ChlorophyllA' and sample_date IS NOT NULL group by date_trunc('month', sample_date)::date " data <- get_data(sql) if(nrow(data) == 0) { cat("No data available") } else { plot_ly(data, x = ~sample_date, y = ~n_measurements, type = "bar") |> layout( title = "ChlorophyllA Measurements by Month", xaxis = list(title = "Sample Date"), yaxis = list(title = "Number of Measurements", tickformat = ",d") ) } ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ### Depth distribution ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} sql <- " select upper_depth, depth_units from app.bottle where 1=1 and upper_depth is not null and depth_units is not null and area_id = 'Bellingham Bay' and analyte = 'ChlorophyllA' " data <- get_data(sql) if(nrow(data) == 0) { cat("No data available") } else { # Define min and max depth for the x-axis x_min <- 0 # Minimum depth x_max <- 350 # Maximum depth # Create histogram plot_ly( data = data, x = ~upper_depth, type = "histogram", xbins = list( start = x_min, # Set bin start end = x_max, # Set bin end size = 5 # Bin width of 5 meters ) ) |> layout( title = "ChlorophyllA Measurements by Depth", xaxis = list( title = glue("Depth ({toString(unique(data$depth_units))})"), range = c(x_min, x_max) # Ensure fixed depth range ), yaxis = list(title = "Number of Measurements", tickformat = ",d") ) } ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}

", .na = "--" ) ) p <- ggplot(data = data, aes(x = abb_month, y = year, fill = median)) + ggiraph::geom_tile_interactive(aes(tooltip = tooltip), color = "black", width = 1) + scale_fill_distiller( palette = "Greens", direction = 1, na.value = "gray90" ) + #coord_fixed() + # keep tile as square scale_x_discrete( breaks = month.abb, drop = FALSE, expand = c(0,0), position = "top" ) + scale_y_reverse(expand = c(0,0)) + labs(y = "Year", fill = paste0("Median ChlorophyllA\n(",toString(unique(data$units)),")")) + theme_bw() + theme( axis.title.x=element_blank(), panel.grid.major = element_blank(), panel.grid.minor = element_blank(), #legend.position = "bottom" ) ggiraph::girafe(ggobj = p) } ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: #### Heatmap Data The heatmap data contains samples from all depths and locations in a given area. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} if(nrow(data) == 0) { cat("No data available") } else{ data |> select( #Area = area_id, Year = year, Month = abb_month, Parameter = parameter, Units = units, 'Measurement Count' = n_measurements, Median = median ) |> make_table(id = "Bellingham Bay_Bottle_ChlorophyllA", name = "heatmap") } ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
